entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:16 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 12:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: SSE 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with a few rain showers. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
